```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

ds = read_csv("./data/disney_plus_titles.csv")
```
```{r}
movies = ds %>%
  filter(type == "Movie")

movies = movies %>%
  mutate(duration = as.integer(str_replace(movies$duration, " min","" )))
```
